Text: My problem persists. I updated my direct x to 10 and still Super Meat Boy won't even start. Goes straight to an error screen basically stating that Super Meat Boy has encountered a problem and was shut down :'(. I really want to play this game too!
whats the details on the error?

"SuperMeatBoy.exe has encountered a problem and needs to close. We are sorry for the inconvenience" message pops up every time I start up Super Meat Boy no matter which version. Something is missing but i am not sure what! I am running it on windows XP with updated Direct X 10. Not sure if i am missing anything else. Also I downloaded Microsoft Visual C++ 2008 Redistributable Package (x86)  and still doesn't work :'(
when that box pops up. click "view details" (or something similer) what does it say there?
hey i am still having trouble with my meat runing in place and cant jump when that is happening. this is really bad in warp zone 1

Lots of things. This is the Error Signature: "AppName: supermeatboy.exe	 AppVer: 0.0.0.0	 ModName: supermeatboy.exe
ModVer: 0.0.0.0	 Offset: 00085fa1" When i click to view technical information about the error report it gives loads of information and associate it to a file included with the report... C:\DOCUME~1\Owner\LOCALS~1\Temp\9f5b_appcompat.txt. Can you help?
Game is harder to run than it is to play
it just freezes at lv 3 (once i get to his girl) :(((
it crashes on lv 3 :((
wow. ive never seen that one before maybe some1 else can chime in

Replay Manager is buggy.

Try playing in Windowed Mode, ryanppax, if you're still having trouble with Meat Boy running in place.

DirectX Problems: http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/en/details.aspx?FamilyID=2da43d38-db71-4c1b-bc6a-9b6652cd92a3
Can someone help me, any level after 3 freezes right when I get to the ending point, either bandage girl or a warp zone. Please help.

FIX: Create an empty folder called "UserData"
That's it!
Simple eh?

Fantastic game - had to tear myself away from it to write this comment thanks!

the problem was fixed when i got rid of  all my user data but now when i select windowed, it doesnt window
restart my computer fixed that problem. we all good :)
Also, I can run theta just fine.. it's outdated & my usb controller doesn't work on it though /:

I haven't had a single problem with this game until World 4.  Some of the moving platforms will randomly kill me when I'm standing on them, usually when passing under low ceilings above.  Anybody else have this issue? I can't beat a couple of stages in world 4 because of it.  4-2 was the first issue I had.
